H0.text: which way does the earth orbit the sun. Clockwise

H1.text: which way does the earth orbit the sun. Perpendicular to the ecliptic plane

H2.text: which way does the earth orbit the sun. In a figure-eight pattern

H3.text: which way does the earth orbit the sun. counter clockwise

A4.text: From a vantage point above the north pole of either the Sun or Earth, Earth would appear to revolve in a counterclockwise direction around the Sun.

A5.text: Earth orbits the Sun at an average distance of 149.60 million km [...] in a counterclockwise direction as viewed from above the Northern Hemisphere.
